parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region where the CLB instances are deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~27584~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

>  If the endpoint of the region is slb.aliyuncs.com, you must specify the `RegionId` parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ServerCertificateId
parameters.description: The ID of the server certificate.
